title: Chocolate Banana Bread [Vegan]
directions: In a bowl, mix together flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt and desiccated coconut and stir well.
In a separate bowl, mash bananas until they are pretty smooth. Stir in the brown sugar and oil.
Combine the wet and the dry mixtures and stir until well incorporated.
Bake at 350F for 50 minutes and allow to cool.
In a saucepan or bain Marie, melt the chocolate for the ganache until smooth and stir in coconut milk. Pour over the cooled loaf.
ingredients: 1 2/3 cups of spelt flour (or flour of choice)
1/3 cup of oil (I used melted coconut oil)
1 bar vegan chocolate, chopped or 1/3 cup vegan chocolate chips
1/2 a large bar of dark chocolate (about 4.4 ounces)
